meanings.definition: The act of enlisting or joining a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: Many young people made enlistments in the local community service group.
meanings.sent2: The enlistments for the school club exceeded expectations this year.
meanings.sent3: During the bake sale, the enlistments to help with the decorations were a big hit.
meanings.sent4: Her enlistments in the book club opened up a whole new world of literature for her.
meanings.sent5: The enlistments in the neighborhood watch program made the community safer.

meanings.definition: The process of signing up for military service.
meanings.sent1: His enlistments in the army were a proud moment for his family.
meanings.sent2: The enlistments for the navy were happening at the recruitment office.
meanings.sent3: The enlistments for the air force were delayed due to bad weather.
meanings.sent4: She saw his enlistments in the marines as a brave decision.
meanings.sent5: The enlistments in the military changed his life forever.

meanings.definition: The recruitment of individuals for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The enlistments for the charity event were going smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Her enlistments for the research project impressed the team.
meanings.sent3: The enlistments for the dance competition were full of enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: His enlistments for the secret mission were kept confidential.
meanings.sent5: The enlistments for the rescue mission were urgent and crucial.
